name: Pocket Trials
description:
Quick and challenging! Can you become the Trial Master?

Pocket Trials is a simple platformer with short levels. You can jump, dash and wall-grab to traverse, avoid obstacles and reach the next level.

In-game help text:

Jump towards a wall to cling on it for a moment.

Reach the teleporter to finish each trial!

Controls:

Left/Right - move / wall grab
Up/Down - look
Space/V - jump
B - dash

Gamepads are supported

Game made for Game Boy Jam 7, by Bruno Assarisse and Murilo Clemente

Dev comments:

Unfortunately, we ended up spending too much time polishing and making sure the game felt good, so the game currently has only 5 levels. We plan to increase that after the jam rate period is done.
